des: "Diced mango and avocado pair with a little lime, curry, and onion to make a great side dish for a barbecue. I brought a huge bowl of this to a small party, and it was devoured. You can also dice the ingredients finer to make a nice salsa-style dip."
ins: Toss together the mango, avocado, onion, lime juice, and curry powder in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.
